requirement: This code is intended to implement the functionality for clearing elevator stop requests and associated indicators for a specified floor based on input conditions.
provide_code:
FUNCTION F_ClearFloorStop
VAR_INPUT
	nFloor			:	USINT;		//楼层号
	bClearUpStop	:	BOOL;		//是否清除上升停靠标志
	bClearDownStop	:	BOOL;		//是否清除下降停靠标志
	bClearStopFloor	:	BOOL;		//是否清除楼层停靠标志
END_VAR
